extension.name: Content - WizardGo
extension.author: WizardGo.
extension.description: WizardGo Audio Player is a plugin that allows your visitors to listen to a beautiful narration of your posts. Engage and amaze your users, allowing them to interact with your content in a new way, by listening to it. You think this *sounds* too good to be true? We challenge you to give it a try and draw your own conclusions! Visitors will love to hear your content aloud!
